settings.text:
Skincare shouldn’t stop at the face.

Our safe, non-invasive skin rejuvenation LED treatment targets a part of the skincare routine many people overlook – the neck and décolletage.

This delicate area is actually where the first signs of aging show – thin skin, wrinkles, sun spots, age spots and more.

Now, you can conveniently boost firmness, even skin tone and texture, plump fine lines for youthful-looking neck and décolletage skin with our clinically-proven portable, at-home LED light therapy treatment.

No trips to the clinic, and no pain, side effects, or down time. (Your low neckline wardrobe will thank you for it!).
Reduces fine lines & wrinkles
Diminishes the appearance of pigmentation
Rejuvenates dark spots & sun damaged skin
Increases hydration & brightens the skin
Promotes healthier, younger-looking skin

Technology light years ahead of the game

This device features LED lights placed in the center of the chest where most fine lines appear.

Our LED uses clinical-grade technology to deliver safe, concentrated wavelengths deep into the layers of the skin where even the best creams and serums can’t reach. That’s where the magic happens.

[details]

settings.text:

CHARGING TIME: 4 hours

USE: 5-7 times per week

WAVELENGTH: 633nm (Red), 830nm (Near-Infra Red)

LEDs: 55 dual core

[code]

settings.code:
Your skin absorbs the natural light, kickstarting production of elastin, collagen, and fibroblasts – known to enhance skin firmness and smoothness. It’s truly working to repair and rejuvenate your skin from the inside out!

Addresses premature skin ageing

Renews and nourishes skin

settings.text: Cleanse and dry your skin to prepare it for ultimate LED light absorption. Secure the device around your neck using the adjustable velcro straps.
Press & hold to start your 10-minute treatment. With a hands-free controller & clip-on, you can either relax or go about your day.
The device will automatically shut off after 10 minutes. Remove the device and gently wipe it down. Follow up with your normal skincare routine. That’s it!

settings.heading: From sun damage to this
settings.text: "After years damage from the strong Aussie sun I wanted to try LED therapy to help rejuvenate and repair my decollate area as I read lots of positive reviews on it. I’m so glad I did because after using it daily, I've witnessed this transformation!!! Skin is firmer, sunspots have faded and texture is so much smoother!!"

settings.heading: My first aging signs
settings.text: "I’ve always taken care of my face but neglected my neck and chest skin so I’ve made it a top priority in the past year. Since using LED regularly, the pesky fine lines in the middle of my chest are so much smoother and my skin looks youthful again! I love how this qure device has LEDs placed in the centre of the chest unlike other devices."

settings.heading: Deep wrinkles
settings.text: "I’m so impressed with the results! I noticed a difference after a few weeks however when comparing photos I am so surprised at how much younger the skin on my neck and chest looks. Wrinkles have significantly reduced, sun spots are lighter and my skin looks and feels more rejuvenated. Device is easy to use, I love that I can clip the controller to my robe and multitask around the house whilst the treatment is on."

settings.heading: Stubborn inflammation
settings.text: "After struggling with acne and the stubborn pigmentation it left behind, I'm thrilled with the results I've seen after using Qure LED chest device. My skin is clearer, and the pigmentation has significantly faded. The most important, I don’t have to cover my neck and chest with foundations and concealers anymore"

settings.heading: Hello Beautiful Skin, Goodbye Clinical Costs
settings.text:
Are you ready to enjoy the same technology used in clinics, without the price tag or hassle?

Get that professional-looking result from the comfort of your own home – for a fraction of what you’d pay elsewhere.

settings.heading: How does it work?
settings.text: Two clinically proven wavelengths of light (red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm) work on a cellular level to stimulate new collagen, reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and reduce sun damage and the visible signs of aging.

settings.heading: How many LED lights does it have? What are the wavelengths?
settings.text:
LEDs: 55 Dual-core LEDs
Wavelengths: 633 nm, 830 (Red and Near-Infrared)

settings.heading: How often should I use it for optimal results?
settings.text: For best results, we recommend using the device 5-7 times a week. Each session only lasts 10 minutes. Visible results may vary, but improvements can be seen within 4 weeks of consistent use. More significant changes can be seen over several months. Be sure to take before and after pictures to track your progress. Sometimes it can be hard to notice a difference until you compare your photos. Just remember, consistency is key!

settings.heading: How long is the treatment?
settings.text: Just 10 minutes! A one and a half hour charge can deliver up to 7 to 8 treatments.

settings.heading: Is it safe for all skin types?
settings.text: Yes, this device is safe for all skin types. It is non-invasive and gentle on the skin. However, if you have specific skin conditions, we recommend consulting with a dermatologist before use.

settings.heading: Can I use it on other areas of my body?
settings.text: While it's primarily designed for the neck and chest, some users apply it to their face or other body areas such as the back and hands.. Refer to the user manual for specific usage recommendations.

settings.heading: Can I use any serum/creams on my skin underneath my Neck & Décolletage LED device?
settings.text: For optimal results use the device on clean, bare skin. Creating a barrier between the device and your skin with unauthorized skincare products may diminish its effectiveness or potentially cause skin reactions.

settings.heading: Can you use this if you're pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.text: Pregnant and breastfeeding individuals should exercise caution when considering any new skincare or beauty treatment. It is generally recommended to consult with a healthcare professional, before using such devices during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

settings.heading: How do you clean it?
settings.text: To clean the Qure Neck & Décolletage LED follow these steps: turn it off, gently wipe the treatment head with a damp cloth, avoid harsh chemicals, dry it thoroughly, and store it in a cool, dry place.

settings.heading: How do I charge the device?
settings.text:
Charge Neck & Décolletage device fully for 4 hours before your first use. Only use a 5V adapter or computer USB port. Please avoid fast chargers as they can damage the battery.

To charge the device, insert the USB-C cable into the controller. Insert the USB-A side of the cable into a USB power supply. When the controller is charged, the LED indicator on the controller flashes white, and when the controller is fully charged, the indicator will be steady white.

settings.heading: What comes with the device?
settings.text:
• Neck & Décolletage LED device
  • Controller
  • USB & Charging Cable
  • 2 Velcro Straps (1 Short, 1 Long)
  • User Manual
  • Luxury storage bag

settings.heading: Can I use my LED Mask and Neck & Décolletage LED at the same time?
settings.text: Yes! You can use your Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear and the Neck & Décolletage LED at the same time. For better results, we recommend using the device 5-7 times a week.
